summary: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.
cast: Sudeep|Nani|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Hamsa Nandini|Crazy Mohan|Santhanam|Adithya Menon|Chandra Sekhar|Srinivasa Reddy|Sivannarayana|Devadarshini Chetan|Noel Sean|Dhanraj|Thagubothu Ramesh|Venkatesh Chakravarthy|Micky Makhija|J. Karthik
title: Eega
